abstract: AT&T agreed to pay $2.5 billion for licenses that will allow it to expand wireless services or provide video broadcasts in much of its coverage area, the company announced Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: AT&T agreed to pay $2.5 billion for licenses that will allow it to expand wireless services or provide video broadcasts in much of its coverage area, the company announced Tuesday.

headline.main: AT&T to Pay $2.5 Billion for Wireless Spectrum
